title: Melia Hotels Rewards Agents With Melia Pro Training
text:
Last updated: 09:50 AM ET, Mon July 20 2015 Melia Hotels Rewards Agents With Melia Pro Training Travel Agent | Melia Hotels International | Courtney Love | July 20, 2015 
PHOTO: The Gran Melia Palacio de Isora on the beach in Tenerife is considered to be one of the best hotels in Spain. (Courtesy of Melia Hotels) 
Travel Agent Academy is excited to announce a partnership with Meliá Hotels to promote its Meliá Pro Training, an online game to help travel professionals learn more about their brand and how to better position them to their clients.
